titles: Ioyfull nevves from Ireland, or, A trve relation of the great overthrow which the English gave the rebels before Drogheda sent in a letter bearing the date the 27 of February, to Sir Robert King Knight at Cecil House in the Strand.
author: Loftus, Edward, 17th cent.
notes: Also appears in: Two letters of note / George Digby.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
